items.name: Sizzling Shrimp Skewers
items.description: Grilled shrimp skewers marinated in a spicy Timorese sauce

items.name: Grilled Coconut Chicken
items.description: Tender chicken marinated in coconut milk and spices, grilled to perfection

items.name: Braised Lamb Shank
items.description: Tender lamb shank slow-cooked in a savory broth with fragrant spices

items.name: Grilled Octopus with Piri Piri Sauce
items.description: Tender octopus grilled to perfection and served with a spicy Timorese Piri Piri sauce

items.name: Grilled Marinated Barramundi
items.description: Fresh barramundi fillet marinated in Timorese spices and grilled to perfection. Served with fragrant rice and sauteed vegetables.

items.name: Grilled Crocodile Skewers
items.description: Tender crocodile meat marinated in Timorese spices and grilled to perfection. Served with a side of sambal matah.

items.name: Bebinca
items.description: A traditional layered pudding made with coconut milk, eggs, and sugar.
